channel.title: Python on Bart de Goede
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Bart de Goede

item.title: Bloom filters, using bit arrays for recommendations, caches and Bitcoin
item.description: Bloom filters are cool. In my experience, it’s a somewhat underestimated data structure that sounds more complex than it actually is. In this post I’ll go over what they are, how they work (I’ve hacked together an interactive example to help visualise what happens behind the scenes) and go over some of their usecases in the wild.
